Storytell

  • Education

    From 2011 to 2015 I was studied in KKBAD (Kiev Construction College, Architecture and Design), and received his associate's degree. In 2015 I entered the KNUBA (Kyiv National University Construction and Architecture) and to date has refused this type of education.

  • Begin

    In 2015, I became interested in the front-end and bought a book - "html, javascript, php and MySql. Gentleman set webmaster.". After some time, I began to take courses HTML Academy in parallel. Tried different methods of layout and interested in design.

    After, I tried different interesting things at Codepen, watched courses from such famous schools like HTML Academy, LoftSchool, GeekBraing and etc.

    When I picked up some knowledge I created my first website BarberShop (you can see it in the "works"). Another site called nerds. I really liked to create websites. Then, I created a website "TripFinder" using the bootstrap. It was interesting.

  • UNIT Factory

    In the summer of 2016, I passed the test to join the UNIT Factory. Since I was one of those people who have passed the test better than the other - I took the first "pool". It was an unforgettable experience. The first few days we were taught console MAC OSX. Then we began to learn the language C, and fun is began.

    Despite the fact that I have a month, every day was there from 10 am to 11 pm every day I was interested and I was full of energy to go on.

  • Recently

    I create another site ProjectAdventure(which can be seen in the "works"). In this website I used sass, gulp, jquery, npm and bower. After that, I was confident in my skills and began to teach JavaScript. I studied at the learn.javascript.ru, codecademy, codeschool. Watched courses from HTML Academy, JSBursa, LoftSchool and etc. I interesting in the that language because it give more opportunities for websites.
